I am a seventeen year old girl and I am having many of the same problems that you are having.  I have pain in the same place and same type that you describe.  I also have migraines, gas, and nausea.  I have gone through every test which found gastroparesis, lactose intolerance, acid reflux, and a gastrointestinal motility disorder.  One test you can still try is a sits-marker test which will show how long it takes stuff to get through your entire system.  What medications are you on for the constipation?  Another thing you can try that helped me is to cut out all gas producing foods like beans, carbonation, and caffeine.  Good luck and let me know if you have any questions.
